paper_abstract: In this paper the derivation of Kalman filter for discrete time-stochastic fractional system is investigated. Based on a novel cumulative vector form model for fractional systems, a general Kalman filter is introduced. The validity of the proposed method has been compared with a previously presented method via simulation results. It is shown that this method can be better applied for discrete time stochastic fractional systems with slower dynamics. (C) 2013 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: On the general Kalman filter for discrete time stochastic fractional systems
